Data Visualization

A collection of various datasets that I am interested in, visualized with Chart.js.

HSR Network Gravity Models

An interactive map displaying strengths and sizes of hypothetical high speed rail networks in the US.

Mindfulness

A graphical representation of mindfulness lengths at the Bay School of San Francisco.

HSR Gravity Models

An graphical representation of the best pairs of metropolitan areas for building high speed rail.

Gravity Models

An graphical representation of the metropolitan area pairs with the highest gravity score.

Created by Lucas Chang | Built with Nuxt.js, Chart.js, and Tailwind CSS
